CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(LEGACY_ID__c), "No ID for this Organisation", IF(ISBLANK($Setup.Lodgement_Report_Settings__c.Report_URL__c), 'Report URL not configured.',HYPERLINK($Setup.Lodgement_Report_Settings__c.Report_URL__c + LEGACY_ID__c , "Lodgement Report for " + Name)))
CustomField.label: Lodgement Report
